is-premises-address-same.required: Select if your contact details are the same for your licence and business address

premises-address-line-1.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
premises-address-line-1.maxlength: Address line 1 must be between 1 and 250 characters

premises-address-line-2.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
premises-address-line-2.maxlength: Address line 2 must be between 1 and 250 characters

premises-town-or-city.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
premises-town-or-city.maxlength: Town or city must be between 1 and 250 characters

premises-telephone.ukPhoneNumber: Enter a UK telephone number in the correct format, like 01632 960001 or +44 808 157 0192

guarantor-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

guarantor-confirmed-dbs.required: Confirm if the Guarantor has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

guarantor-dbs-full-name.required: Enter a name as it appears on the guarantor’s DBS certificate
guarantor-dbs-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

guarantor-dbs-reference.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

guarantor-dbs-date-of-issue.required: Enter a date of issue or application
guarantor-dbs-date-of-issue.date: Enter a date of issue or application in the correct format
guarantor-dbs-date-of-issue.before: Date of issue or application must be today or in the past
guarantor-dbs-date-of-issue.after: Date of issue or application must be within the last 3 years

is-guarantor-subscribed.required: Select if the guarantor has subscribed to DBS updates
